ygData.subject: RE: Freeport Bank Crowding Secret was: Bard Petition
ygData.msgSnippet: this no longer works since the last patch.  looks like i am kos forever for killing lucan. Shada
ygData.messageBody:
this no longer works since the last patch. looks like i am kos forever for
killing lucan.

Shada

>
> Actually there is one way to raise your faction with the
> Freeport Militia
> without harming you faction with the paladins. If you go
> into the tunnels
> beneath Freeport you will bump into a human standing beside a a dwarf.
> When you talk to the dwarf he will mention how much he misses
> Kaladim. To
> alleviate his homesickness you give his human friend some
> dwarven ale and
> bang you improve your faction with the Freeport Militia. BTW if the
> Freeport Militia hate you, the people of Freeport will hate you also.
> Except in North Freeport since the Paladins run that area.
>
>
> Treilanin Loreweaver
> Honour Guard, Karana
>
